Description:
Detects when a rule has been added to the Windows Firewall exception list

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Uncommon New Firewall Rule Added In Windows Firewall Exception List
Query: sourcetype='windows-firewall-as' eql select * from _source_ where ((eventid = '2004' or eventid = '2071' or eventid = '2097') and  not ((applicationpath like '%c:\perflogs\%' or applicationpath like '%c:\temp\%' or applicationpath like '%c:\tmp\%' or applicationpath like '%c:\users\public\%' or applicationpath like '%c:\windows\tasks\%' or applicationpath like '%c:\windows\temp\%' or applicationpath like '%\appdata\local\temp\%') or applicationpath = 'null' or action = '2' or (applicationpath like 'c:\program files (x86)\%' or applicationpath like 'c:\program files\%' or applicationpath like 'c:\windows\system32\%' or applicationpath like 'c:\windows\syswow64\%' or applicationpath like 'c:\windows\winsxs\%')) and  not ((modifyingapplication like 'c:\programdata\microsoft\windows defender\platform\%' and modifyingapplication like '%\msmpeng.exe') or ((modifyingapplication = 'c:\windows\system32\svchost.exe' or modifyingapplication = 'c:\windows\system32\dllhost.exe') and applicationpath = '')))
